潣字的基本解释

潣
mǐn
古同“浼”，污。
水流平缓的样子。

潣字的汉语字典释义

[①]［mǐn］
［《廣韻》眉殞切，上軫，明。］
亦作“湏2”。
(1)水流平缓貌。也作“浼”。
(2)同“浼”。污。

潣字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　潣； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页649第23
【唐韻】眉殞切【集韻】【韻會】美殞切，?音閔。【說文】水流浼浼貌。　又【廣韻】武罪切【集韻】母罪切，?音每。同浼。　又【集韻】美辨切，音免。義同。　又【集韻】虎猥切，音賄。水貌。或作湏。

潣字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
潣字的起名意思

水流平缓的样子。

Ling
Basic explanation of words
Ling
mǐn
The ancient same "shui", dirty.
The flow of water is gentle.
Ling
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［mǐn］
["Guang Yun" eyebrows are cut, Shang Zhen, Ming. ]
Also known as "湏2".
(1) Smooth water flow. Also called "浼".
(2) Same as "浼". Sewage.
Ling
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Siji 1] [Water Word Department] 　潣; Kangxi Strokes: 16; Page Number: Page 649 23
[Tang Yun] Eyebrow Death Cut [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] Beautiful Death Cut,? Yin Min. [Said the text] The appearance of the stream.　[Guangyun] Martial crime cut [Jiyun] Mother sin cut, every sound. The same.　[Jiyun] Beautifully distinguished and cut, and the sound is free. The same meaning.　[Jiyun] Tigers cut, sound bribed. Water appearance. Or make up.
Ling
